name: Polly's House
description:
This Game Was Made For Fun And There Is No Jump-scares But Yea Its A Short Horror Game Here Some Useful Stuff

W to walk no need to hold S to stop the walking F to laugh if you are not moving when you laugh if Polly is in front of you it will pop up her baby doll if you see this doll click G within 3 seconds or you die walk for 4:30 Minutes seconds and you win time only goes up when you move.

Sounds/Music: https://freesound.org/

Font: https://fontmeme.com/cursive-fonts/

Code: my fingers
